DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Sets the depth to which the mine will descend and wait, and sets its trigger to the given target types, hostility, and proximity. The mine is armed after the given delay after it reaches its depth.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>mine_depth</myVariableName> <myType>depth</myType> <myLabel>Mine Depth</myLabel> <myToolTip>Depth to which mine will sink and wait.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>explode_within_radius</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Detonate Proximity</myLabel> <myToolTip>Radius in which the mine will explode when an entity is sensed</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>10</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>arm_time</myVariableName> <myType>time</myType> <myLabel>Arming Delay:</myLabel> <myToolTip>The time delay before the mine is armed, after it reaches the specified depth.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>targets</myVariableName> <myType>entitytypes</myType> <myLabel>Trigger Entity Types:</myLabel> <myToolTip>What types of entities will trigger the mine.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>hostile_only</myVariableName> <myType>checkbox</myType> <myLabel>Hostile Only</myLabel> <myToolTip>Whether only hositle entities can trigger the mine.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
